alcohol_limit.notes: 0.00% for novice drivers (<3 years) and professionals.

rules.child_seat_rules: Children <150cm require appropriate restraint showing ECE compliance.
rules.headlights_rules: Dipped headlights mandatory on highways/dual carriageways even during day.
rules.priority_rules: Right has priority. Roundabouts: Give way to traffic inside (usually).

tolls.notes: Autostrada (Green signs) are tolls. Take ticket on entry, pay on exit. 'Telepass' lanes are reserved.

rules.parking_rules: Blue lines = Paid. White lines = Free (check signs). Yellow = Residents/Disabled only.
rules.winter_rules: Winter tires or chains carried on board mandatory in many regions (Nov 15 - Apr 15).

summary: Driving in Italy requires confidence. Traffic can be chaotic in cities but follows an unspoken flow. Be terrified of 'ZTL' (Limited Traffic Zones) in historic centersâ€”cameras will fine you automatically.
common_traps: ZTL Zones (Zona Traffico Limitato) - Huge fines for entering historic centers.
Bus lanes usage is strictly fined.
rental_and_idp_notes: IDP strictly required for non-EU license holders by law (rarely asked, but legally needed).

regional_variations.notes: Chaotic traffic. Scooters everywhere. Do not enter ZTL Trident or Centro Storico.
Area C congestion charge zone. Area B pollution zone.
